pages.text: A very unique alloy of iron, this meteorite-infused material seems to be much stronger than iron.$(br2)I can use this to create powerful tools and armor rivaling even $(thing)soulforged steel.$()

I'm able to create this by borrowing the power of the $(l:slayers_journal/quazar)Quazar$() from volatile powder and 12 meteor shards I've collected from meteor strikes, together in a stoked crucible to get 12 $(thing)meteorite ingots$().
